title: Schools Awarded the Green Flag in the Dublin Region
content: Green Flag Schools are schools which are given awards for their “green,” or environmentally conscious policies. The Green Schools initiative produces several themes – litter and waste, energy, water, travel, biodiversity, and global citizenship – around which new projects and existing policies by students are rewarded with Green Flag Status. The number of Green Flag schools in Dublin has steadily increased since 2004, with the most recent data in (coming soon) showing (coming soon) number of schools – or (coming soon) percent of all total schools in Dublin – as having received a Green Flag award.
